channel.title: Code for co owner
channel.description: Can someone help me how to make a staff member a co owner. If u do please commet on my topic all i know is 1 normal player 2= mod 3= admin and i dont know what else

item.title: Code for co owner
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:6, topic:507933”][quote author=Dylan123321 link=topic=626170.msg4259390#msg4259390 date=1363306469]
go to your commands.java and just don’t give him all the commands.
[/quote]
Helpful++
Simply give the player admin rank, and add && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name_here") to the commands you wish to give them the ability to use.
Alternatively, you could just make a rank called CO_OWNER, which you could find by searching on Google.[/quote]
OR, you could set this up on your server:

		if (c.playerRights >= 0)
			playerCommands(c, playerCommand);
		if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2) 
			staffCommands(c, playerCommand);
		if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(Config.OWNER) || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(Config.CO_OWNER))
			ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);

and make a method for each one of those…

Read full topic

item.title: Code for co owner
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Dylan123321:

go to your commands.java and just don’t give him all the commands.

Helpful++
Simply give the player admin rank, and add && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name_here") to the commands you wish to give them the ability to use.
Alternatively, you could just make a rank called CO_OWNER, which you could find by searching on Google.

item.title: Code for co owner
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Just put him as joint owner, 3 player rights and you can customize some commands so he can’t use everything.

Read full topic
